vision_analysis.read_text: MENU APPETIZERS PRIX FIXE Shrimp Remoulade/Shrimp Cocktail . . . 16.00 Three Courses: 45 Spicy Lobster . 19.00 First Course: Lobster Bisque Baked Escargot . . 16.00 Entrée: Cornish Game Hen, Seared Ahi Tuna . 17.00 Grilled Salmon or 12 oz Sirloin Prosciutto Wrapped Mozzarella . . 14.00 Dessert: Bananas Foster STEAK CUTS SALADS AND SOUPS Filet Mignon, 8 ounce . 38.00 Spinach Salad 9.50 Apples, goat cheese, apple cider dressing Filet Mignon, 12 ounce . 49.00 Caprese Salad 7.50 Rib Eye Steak, 18 ounce . 39.00 Ripe tomato with fresh mozzarella and basil Porterhouse for Two 40.00 French Onion Soup . 5.00 000

recommendations.reason: High in protein and omega-3 fatty acids, moderate in calories, and aligns with a balanced diet.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request minimal oil in preparation and pair with steamed vegetables if available.

recommendations.reason: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and protein, supports heart health and fits a moderate calorie target.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Ask for no butter or sauce, and pair with a side of vegetables.

recommendations.item: Spinach Salad (Apples, goat cheese, apple cider dressing)
recommendations.reason: Provides leafy greens, fiber, and healthy fats from goat cheese, with a lighter dressing option.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request dressing on the side and consider reducing the amount of goat cheese for lower calorie intake.

recommendations.item: Caprese Salad (Ripe tomato with fresh mozzarella and basil)
recommendations.reason: Fresh vegetables and moderate fat content from mozzarella, offering a balanced option.
recommendations.healthier_modifications: Request less mozzarella or opt for a smaller portion to manage calorie intake.

items_to_avoid.reason: High in calories and saturated fats, not ideal for a moderate calorie target.

Likely high in sugar and calories, not suitable for a balanced, moderate-calorie diet.
